name: Slime Through Time
description:
SOLVE THE PUZZLE AND BEAT THE FINAL BOSS OR YOU CAN'T DO THAT?????

-Controls-

  • Move - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Eat Child - LMB
  • Aim - RMB
  • Shoot Child - LMB (While Aiming and have 2 health)
  • Control your children - R

-Description-

3D Top Down Action Adventure Puzzle Platformer game where we play as a Slime in which we need to get back to our save the past time from evil gigantic robot. We go past obstacles by jumping and solving puzzles with an added twist that we can create children of ourselves to help with our task. This adds Resource management into the core gameplay.

3 Enemies (Electric Fly, Rocket Prime, Boss)

-Point Plus-

-Beautiful scenery and cutscenes

-Epic Boss Battle
